summary: In 1960s Dublin a young girl becomes involved with an older man, a much-travelled and still married land-owner.
cast: Peter Finch|Rita Tushingham|Lynn Redgrave|Marie Kean|Arthur O'Sullivan|Julian Glover|T.P. McKenna|Liselotte Goettinger|Pat Laffan|Eileen Crowe|May Craig|Joe Lynch|Yolande Turner|Harry Brogan|Michael C. Hennessy|Joseph O'Donnell|Michael O'Brien|David Kelly|Oliver MacGreevy
keywords: roman catholic priest|irate father|ferry to england|shooting a gun into the ceiling|ireland
title: La chica de los ojos verdes
